summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 21378, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, altering and establishing of Grand Street, from the west margin of Fourteenth Avenue South from the north, to the east margin of Twenty-second Avenue South, from the north; and from the east margin of Twenty-fifth Avenue South, from the south, to the east margin of Twenty-eighth Avenue South, from the south, all in the City of Seattle, and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law: approved 10th day of July, 1909.
